resources.string:
DarQ Accessibility Service

Required for the app to work, allows it to monitor apps running and enable/disable the force-dark setting accordingly. Enable it and return the app to continue.

PLEASE NOTE:
As of Android 10, when enabling an accessibility service, no matter how minor its access, you will be warned that the service can read the screen and act on behalf of you, and that it is not appropriate for most apps. This is normal, please just tap 'Ok'. If you wish to view what DarQ is doing (and more importantly, not doing) programmatically, you can view its source on GitHub.

Note for non-root users:
Enabling or disabling this toggle will require you to run the script from your computer again.
Toggle the main system dark theme
Enable the force dark theme setting globally. This overrides the enabled apps list.
Restart any apps to apply this change
Automatically enable dark theme at sunset and disable at sunrise
Enable the Oxygen OS \"Entire World\" force dark (applies to most apps)
View the instructions and FAQ on running DarQ without root

The Accessibility Service is running, but DarQ was unable to connect to the service running from ADB. Please follow the steps at the link below to enable it, and if this issue persists try restarting the app or rebooting your device and running the tool on your computer again.
The Accessibility Service is running, but DarQ was unable to connect to the root service. Please try restarting the app or, if the issue persists, rebooting your device.
DarQ requires the use of an accessibility to reliably and quickly respond to apps opening and closing. Please enable it from Android\'s Accessibility Settings.
DarQ\'s accessibility service is not currently running, please try disabling it and re-enabling it in Android\'s Accessibility Settings. If that doesn\'t work, please try rebooting your device.

Auto dark theme uses dynamic sunrise and sunset calculation, based on your location. This can either be obtained using the location permission (more accurate) or by your timezone city. Your timezone is currently set to %1s.\n\nNote: Due to changes in Android 10, you have the choice of only allowing the permission when the app is running. As DarQ runs in the background, please select "Allow all the time" on the permission prompt.
Force dark requires the system dark theme to be enabled to work. Please enable it below to see changes in apps.
Permission denied, please grant manually in your device\'s app settings
Prevent selected apps from disabling force dark (uses same list of apps as normal force dark)
